LightningComponentBundle.description: Provides a button that sets output text (switcher) and requests a Next navigation.

property.name: buttonLabel
property.label: Button Label
property.description: Label that will appear on the button.

property.name: switcherValue
property.label: Switcher Value
property.description: Value that will be returned to the switcher variable if this button is clicked. Defaults to 'Next'.

property.name: isFinish
property.label: Is Finish?
property.description: If true, button sends a Finish instead of Next event.

property.name: switcher
property.label: Path Switcher
property.description: Defines the path the user selected, e.g. Canvas User Search, Next, etc.
